content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here's an example of how you can define the `wrap_string` function in Julia:
```kotlin
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10))
    words = string(text).split(" ")
    for i = 1:length(words)
        if length(string(words[i]))) > text_width
            print(string(words[i]))"\n")
        else
            println(string(words[i]])))
        end
    end
end
```

In this example, we define a function `wrap_string` that takes two arguments: `text::AbstractString`, which is the string to be wrapped, and `text_width::Int=10}`, which is the maximum number of characters per line.
